episode.title: Hill v. Printing Industries of the Gulf Coast

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have also for announcement the judgment and opinion of the Court in 74-456, Hill, the Attorney General of Texas against the Printing Industries of the Gulf Coast.

And here for reasons stated in an opinion filed this morning, the judgment of the District Court is vacated and the case is remanded to that Court for reconsideration in light of the new legislation and for dismissal, if the case is or becomes moot.
Mr. Justice Douglas took no part in the consideration or the decision of this case.
